recipesJson.name: Banana Tobacco
recipesJson.author: RinVapes
recipesJson.description:
*Optional... substitute CAP Graham Cracker for 1% VT Honeycomb

Sweet tobacco with a hint of banana. Good shake and vape. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FPI0BKfUZU0

reviews.text: Some of your recipes i have had a hard time tasting but not this one and wow that FLV Turkish is shining through at only a half percent. I also mixed with the VT Honeycomb bc i do not own any cap v2s. Vaping on 4 day steep as well.
